meaning: the ability to control fear in a situation that may be dangerous or unpleasant.
the ability to make sensible decisions and judgements because of your knowledge or experience.
in a brave and confident way.
being the only one of its kind; unlike anything else.
to make someone feel that they want to do something and can do it.
the act of traveling from one place to another.
in a way that shows you are willing to wait for a long time without becoming annoyed or anxious.
to go to another place to get something or someone and bring it back.
